Yes,  it sounds like this could have been a seizure.Did anyone see it?  If someone saw the whole thing and it appeared that he had just simply fainted,  it seems less likely that it was a seizure - than if he woke up feeling like he had fainted but no one actually saw what happened.A person who has a seizure will have no memory of it,  and is unaware while it's happening,  as if they're passed out.And that would explain both the dilated pupils and the "brain fog".Best wishes.

title: Dialated eyes and lack of awareness
